text: Greed is a basic part of animal nature. Being against it is like being against breathing or eating. It means nothing.
author: Ben Stein

text: The whole order of nature evinces a progressive march towards a higher life.
author: H. P. Blavatsky

text: A poem need not have a meaning and like most things in nature often does not have.
author: Wallace Stevens

text: I'd love to go back to Europe in the '20s and '30s, for the beginning of the Psychoanalytic Movement, and Freud and Jung, and all that was going on with discoveries in quantum physics. The whole nature of reality was changing and being challenged.
author: Michael Sheen

text: Sound is the vocabulary of nature.
author: Pierre Schaeffer
